name: City Builder Game
description:
School project that I'm ready to share with the world.

Gameplay

You start with a procedurally generated plot of land, with trees, lakes and roads (which you cannot build or modify). Your task is to get a high score using randomly given cards, representing buildings. Building these rewards score for being in proximity to other buildings or objects, but can also give negative score (for example: factory being too close to a residential building).

It is a pretty simple game without much content. I may or may not keep working on it. Even if I may never update the game, I would still value any constructive criticism or ideas to improve the game.

Controls

  • Camera movement
    • WASD or arrow keys to move
    • Hold right mouse button to rotate
    • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out
  • Building - Left click drag and drop, Right click to cancel
  • Rotate building - R
  • Flip card for more info - F
  • Main Menu - Esc
